• « Index of Predicates

Predicate: build

Characterizing Axioms

Building can be described by the verb “build”.

(forall (x z)
  (if (build z x)
      (exists (e u v)
        (build-vb e z x u v))))

Additional Axioms

The primed version of build. (This would be automatically generated.)

(forall (e x z)
  (if (and (build' e z x) (Rexist e))
      (build z x)))
